MASCHINE lets you effortlessly produce beats, melodies, and harmonies with powerful drum synths, premium sounds, an integrated sampler, and more â€“ cutting-edge software meets intuitive hardware for ultra-smooth workflow.

MASCHINEâ€™s multi-color pads provide ultimate feel in the thick of the beat. Dedicated group buttons and a master push encoder deliver hands-on control of sounds and key parameters. And eight display knobs automatically map to key instrument parameters for on-the-fly, two-handed tweaking and sound shaping.

The included MASCHINE 2 software is exploding with cutting-edge technology. Improved browsing, arranging, and sampling, plus a new mixer, plug-in strip, and exclusive drum synths. Get ready for the most responsive, fluid, and musical beatmaking experience ever.


New in version 2.4

Full support for the new Native Kontrol Standard (NKS): content for NKS plug-ins will show up in the factory tab of the Maschine Browser

Products can be instantiated directly from the Product selector tab

Third-party plug-ins are grouped by vendor in the hardware plug-in browser and the instantiation context menu

Fixed Issues:

Maschine could crash on loading if certain plug-ins in the project are missing.
Modulation rings on certain parameters did not update while writing modulation.
Inconsistencies in waveform zooming.
Scroll bars would become unaccessible after switching between Mixer and Arranger views.
Certain plug-in views were not recalled correctly.
Japanese text input was broken on Mac OS.
